Class SetupCLI

java.lang.Object
seng.monsters.ui.cli.TestableCLI
seng.monsters.ui.cli.SetupCLI
public final class SetupCLI extends TestableCLI
A CLI to prompt user with the setting for their game

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Runs each setup interface method and makes the main menu CLI out of the returned values.

    • chooseNameInterface

      public String chooseNameInterface()
      Prints a message introducing the player to the game and prompts them for their name and takes the player's input as their name.
      Returns:
      The player's name as a string.

    • chooseMaxDaysInterface

      public int chooseMaxDaysInterface()
      Prints a message prompting the player to enter the number of days they want to play and takes the player input as that.
      Returns:
      The maximum number of days to play as an integer.

    • selectDifficultyInterface

      public int selectDifficultyInterface()
      Prints difficulty options and takes player input to choose a difficulty.
      Returns:
      The difficulty as an integer multiplier.

    • selectStartingMonsterInterface

      public Monster selectStartingMonsterInterface()
      Prints the starting monster choices and takes player input to pick a starting monster.
      Returns:
      The player's starting monster.

    • chooseName

      public String chooseName(String scannerInput) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Takes the player's input as their name.
      Parameters:
      scannerInput - The player's input as a string.
      Returns:
      The player's name as a string.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid input is passed.
